Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Relates to investment of moneys of retirement funds in foreign equity securities
Summary: Provides that not more than thirty per centum of the assets of any fund of the public retirement system shall be invested in foreign equities.
LawCode: Amd ยง177, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to investment of moneys of retirement funds in foreign equity securities
